verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees<WH4609>. Many a time<WH7227> have they afflicted<WH6887> me from my youth<WH5271>, may Israel<WH3478> now say<WH559>: Many: or, Much
Many a time<WH7227> have they afflicted<WH6887> me from my youth<WH5271>: yet they have not prevailed<WH3201> against me. Many: or, Much
The plowers<WH2790> plowed<WH2790> upon my back<WH1354>: they made long<WH748> their furrows<WH4618> <WH4618>.
The LORD<WH3068> is righteous<WH6662>: he hath cut asunder<WH7112> the cords<WH5688> of the wicked<WH7563>.
Let them all be confounded<WH954> and turned<WH5472> back<WH268> that hate<WH8130> Zion<WH6726>.
Let them be as the grass<WH2682> upon the housetops<WH1406>, which withereth<WH3001> afore<WH6927> it groweth up<WH8025>:
Wherewith the mower<WH7114> filleth<WH4390> not his hand<WH3709>; nor he that bindeth sheaves<WH6014> his bosom<WH2683>.
Neither do they which go by<WH5674> say<WH559>, The blessing<WH1293> of the LORD<WH3068> be upon you: we bless<WH1288> you in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068>.
